name: The Other Adventurer 3D
description:
*  The Other Adventurer 3D  *

*      By: Barry Rowe       *
*    Made at TOJam 2020     *
\***************************/

Controls:
 -WASD to move
 -Left mouse to attack
 -Right mouse to block (sword & shield only).
 -E to use (eg: open chests)
 -1-4 to switch weapons
 -Space to jump
 -Escape to quit
 -F5/F8 to Save (not yet finished)

Goal:
 -Find the magical golden goat of glory inside
  deadly dungeon.  You have entered, and lo and
  behold!  It lays right in front of you!  But,
  it is across a gap too wide to reach.  You are
  so close, but so far apart.  Explore the dunegon
  and beat the 4 magical boss slimes to unlock the
  way into the evil slime king's lair.  After
  he is slain, the path to the treasure you
  desire will be unlocked!

Tips:
 -Use your shield to block enemy attacks at the
  right moment to avoid damage.
 -Buy extra supplies in town.
 -You'll need the bomb bag to enter the air (white)
  boss slime's domain.

-Cheats:
 -EQUALS+1: Get all items.
 -EQUALS+2: Set bosses to beaten.
 -EQUALS+3: Set switch state off.
 -EQUALS+4: Set switch state on.
